Dialogue.2: The inside of the Mermaid's Tale is dimly lit, and loud???kind of what you expected from a bar, to be honest.
Dialogue.3: But the man sitting in the middle of it all is one thing you didn't expect. Sure, grizzled beard, rugged face, slightly worn overalls, that's all normal...
Dialogue.4: "Come closer and I'll tell ya about the great sea serpent of Ior! Nearly leveled a village the time I glimpsed it with me own eyes."
Dialogue.5: ...but the fishing pole attached to his arm is decidedly not.
